LanguageData.RWBY_Crescent_Rose_Rifle.label: Crescent Rose
LanguageData.RWBY_Crescent_Rose_Rifle.description: Crescent Rose is Ruby Rose's signature weapon. It is a High-Caliber Sniper-Scythe (HCSS) - a hybrid between a scythe and a sniper rifle.
